unnormalised: **Gas Cylinder Prices Give Diwali Budget a Jolt!**
normalised: **Gas Cylinder Prices Give Diwali Budget a Jolt!**

unnormalised: Hold on to your hats, folks! That Diwali biryani might cost a bit more this year. News just in: gas cylinder prices have seen a bump, again! Looks like Amma's budget calculations are going for a toss.
normalised: Hold on to your hats, folks! That Diwali biryani might cost a bit more this year. News just in: gas cylinder prices have seen a bump, again! Looks like Amma's budget calculations are going for a toss.

unnormalised: The price of a non-subsidized LPG cylinder in Delhi is now Rs. 1150.50, up from Rs. 1100 last month. Ouch!
normalised: The price of a non-subsidized L P G cylinder in Delhi is now rupees one thousand one hundred and fifty point fifty, up from rupees one thousand one hundred last month. Ouch!

unnormalised: Experts at IIM Ahmedabad are saying global energy prices are to blame, but that doesn't make it any easier on your wallet, does it?
normalised: Experts at I I M Ahmedabad are saying global energy prices are to blame, but that doesn't make it any easier on your wallet, does it?

unnormalised: Housewives like Lakshmi in Chennai are already grumbling, saying it’s becoming harder to manage household expenses. "First, the price of tomatoes went up, now this!" she exclaimed.
normalised: Housewives like Lakshmi in Chennai are already grumbling, saying it’s becoming harder to manage household expenses. "First, the price of tomatoes went up, now this!" she exclaimed.

unnormalised: Even though IOCL hasn’t released an official statement, distributors are confirming the new rates.
normalised: Even though I O C L hasn’t released an official statement, distributors are confirming the new rates.

unnormalised: Guess we'll be relying on more traditional chulhas this Diwali! Just kidding… mostly. Maybe time to dust off those old pressure cookers, eh?
normalised: Guess we'll be relying on more traditional chulhas this Diwali! Just kidding… mostly. Maybe time to dust off those old pressure cookers, eh?
